title: Exodus Chapter 2 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Exodus chapter 2 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: Who said "to her, Go" in Exodus 2:8?
questions.explanation: Exodus 2:8 states: "And Pharaoh's daughter said to her, Go. And the maid went and called the child's mother."

questions.question: Who said "unto her, Take this child away, and nurse it for me, and I will give thee thy..." in Exodus 2:9?
questions.explanation: Exodus 2:9 states: "And Pharaoh's daughter said unto her, Take this child away, and nurse it for me, and I will give thee thy wages. And ..."

questions.question: Who said "Who made thee a prince and a judge over us? intendest thou to kill me, as tho..." in Exodus 2:14?
questions.explanation: Exodus 2:14 states: "And he said, Who made thee a prince and a judge over us? intendest thou to kill me, as thou killedst the Egyptian? An..."

questions.question: According to Exodus 2:21, who was content to dwell with the man?
questions.explanation: Exodus 2:21 states: "And Moses was content to dwell with the man: and he gave Moses Zipporah his daughter."

questions.question: Where did the events of Exodus 2:23 take place?
questions.explanation: Exodus 2:23 states: "And it came to pass in process of time, that the king of Egypt died: and the children of Israel sighed by reason of t..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 2:1: "And there went a man of the house of ______, and took to wife a daughter of ______."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And there went a man of the house of Levi, and took to wife a daughter of Levi."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 2:2: "And the ______ conceived, and bare a son: and when she saw him that he was a goodly child, she hid him three months."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the woman conceived, and bare a son: and when she saw him that he was a goodly child, she hid him three months."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 2:3: "And when she ______ not longer hide him, she took for him an ark of bulrushes, and daubed it with slime and with pitch, and put the child therein; ..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And when she could not longer hide him, she took for him an ark of bulrushes, and daubed it with slime and with pitch..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 2:4: "And his ______ stood afar off, to wit what would be done to him."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And his sister stood afar off, to wit what would be done to him."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 2:5: "And the daughter of ______ came down to wash herself at the river; and her maidens walked along by the river's side; and when she saw the ark among..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the daughter of Pharaoh came down to wash herself at the river; and her maidens walked along by the river's side;..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 2:6: "And when she had ______ it, she saw the child: and, behold, the babe wept. And she had compassion on him, and said, This is one of the Hebrews' chi..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And when she had opened it, she saw the child: and, behold, the babe wept. And she had compassion on him, and said, T..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 2:7: "Then said his sister to ______'s daughter, Shall I go and call to thee a nurse of the Hebrew women, that she may nurse the child for thee?"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "Then said his sister to Pharaoh's daughter, Shall I go and call to thee a nurse of the Hebrew women, that she may nur..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 2:10: "And the child grew, and she brought him unto ______'s daughter, and he became her son. And she called his name Moses: and she said, Because I drew ..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the child grew, and she brought him unto Pharaoh's daughter, and he became her son. And she called his name Moses..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 2:11: "And it came to pass in those days, when ______ was grown, that he went out unto his brethren, and looked on their burdens: and he spied an Egyptian..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And it came to pass in those days, when Moses was grown, that he went out unto his brethren, and looked on their burd..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 2:12: "And he ______ this way and that way, and when he saw that there was no man, he slew the Egyptian, and hid him in the sand."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And he looked this way and that way, and when he saw that there was no man, he slew the Egyptian, and hid him in the ..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Exodus 2:13: "And when he went out the ______ day, behold, two men of the Hebrews strove together: and he said to him that did the wrong, Wherefore smitest thou ..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And when he went out the second day, behold, two men of the Hebrews strove together: and he said to him that did the ..."
